General.Name: NOVA Technology Corporation Limited
General.Description: NOVA Technology Corporation Limited provides network communication services in China. The company provides virtual private network, fixed network data transmission, Internet access, data center, cloud computing, and multi-parties communication services. Its services include dedicated network communication services, such as NOVAnet VPN, NOVAnet SD-WAN, Internet access, and NOVAnet IDC; cloud computing services comprising NOVA cloud communication; and system integration services, including smart campus park network solution, data center construction solution, converged cloud communication solution, and airport collaborative decision-making application solution. The company serves customers in the area of finance, retail, property, manufacturing, supply chain, and other fields. NOVA Technology Corporation Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
